kummins.gui

Class TextAreaSystemOut

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.OutputStream
      • kummins.gui.TextAreaSystemOut
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class TextAreaSystemOut
extends java.io.OutputStream
    An output stream that directs the output to a javax.swing.JTextArea control.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TextAreaSystemOut(javax.swing.JTextArea control)
      Creates a new instance of TextAreaOutputStream which writes to the specified instance of javax.swing.JTextArea control.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void write(int b)
      Writes the specified byte as a character to the javax.swing.JTextArea.

        close, flush, write, write

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

      • TextAreaSystemOut

        public TextAreaSystemOut(javax.swing.JTextArea control)
        Creates a new instance of TextAreaOutputStream which writes to the specified instance of javax.swing.JTextArea control.
        Parameters:
        control - A reference to the javax.swing.JTextArea control to which the output must be redirected to.
